tool.name: exportISOTool

param.name: sourcemetadata
param.dialogReference: This should be the full path to a standalone XML metadata document or a dataset with an existing metadata document that has already been upgraded to ArcGIS Metadata format.

param.name: out_metadata
param.dialogReference: This should be the full path to the standalone XML metadata document that will be produced using this tool. Please review and verify the output before harvesting to a metadata catalog.

tool.summary: This tool streamlines exporting ArcGIS metadata to compliant ISO 19115. It is equivalent to using the Export Metadata tool with ArcGIS2ISO19139 as the translator.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: This tool streamlines exporting ArcGIS metadata to compliant ISO 19115. It is equivalent to using the Export Metadata tool with ArcGIS2ISO19139 as the translator.
